statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND email = 'customer1@example.com';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 500 AND total_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_id IN ('12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef', '98765432-10fe-dcba-4321-098765abcdef');
DELETE FROM customer_address WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM customer_address WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE channel = 'Email' AND timestamp < '2021-01-01';
